subject: Attention:xxx,
body:
Attention:xxx,
My name is Grace Sender(miss) and I am the secretary to Dr Richard Montgomery, British High Commissioner .The British High Commission in Nigeria, Benin Republic, South Africa, Ghana, Senegal and Burkina Faso received a report of a scam against you and other British/US and Asian citizens etc.
You are listed and approved for payment as one of the scammed victims,You are to get back to us as soon as possible for the immediate payment of your compensation funds.
On this faithful recommendations, I want you to know that during the last UN /IMF meetings held in Abuja, Nigeria, it was alarmed so much by the rest of the world in the meetings on the lose of funds by various foreigners to the scam artists operating in syndicates all over the world today, in other to retain the good image of the country, the president of the five Countries comprising Nigeria, Benin Republic, South Africa, Ghana and Senegal  in collaboration with the UN and IMF  through their British High Commission office in Nigeria are now paying one hundred and four (104) scam victims cutting across the whole continents of the world as a compensation to maintain good relationship among other nations of the world, the compensation was dim very necessary by the bodies involved Due to the corrupt and inefficient banking systems in Nigeria, the payments are to be paid through (Miss Grace Sender) BRITISH HIGH COMMISSION Headquarters, Abuja, Nigeria through their funding streams such as the Strategic Program Fund (formerly GOF), Public Diplomacy Project Fund, Bilateral Program Budget and Returns & Re-integration Fund also under funding assistance by the Central Bank of Nigeria in Collaboration with the Bank of America.According to the number of applicants at hand, 106 proved victims has been paid, half of the victims are from the United States, Europe and Asia, we still have more 40 left to be paid their compensations.Yours was among those that were reported unpaid as at Friday and we wish to advise you to see to the instructions of the committee to make sure you receive your compensation immediately.
We advise that you do the needful and be advised that you should stop further communication with all those hoodlums who collaborated with their  fake lawyers and security companies to   scam you and  destroyed  your life and that of your love once.you can contact me on 
bri_comm_ng@windowslive.com
Thanks for your understanding and cooperation.
Regards
Grace Sender
for Dr Richard Montgomery CMG

subject: Re: Attention:xxx,
body:
Hello Grace Sender,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite surprising! I wasn't aware that I was listed as a victim of scam. Could you please provide more details about this? How did my name come up in the list? 

Also, could you explain a bit more about how this payment process works? You mentioned several countries and organizations involved, which makes it a bit confusing for me.

I appreciate your help and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Sharon

subject: Dear Sharon,
body:
Dear Sharon,

Your mail was received and content well understood .Yes i know you will be surprised just like other victims of scams were.

This compensation became necessary after a meeting held by the UN /IMF and five Countries comprising Nigeria, Benin Republic, South Africa, Ghana and Senegal to compensate victims of scam who have lost a lot of money in the past to scam artists operating in syndicates and in other to retain the good image of the countries and maintain good relationship among other nations of the world.

 Your name and email was among lucky victims that are to benefit from this compensation valued at the sum of $950,000,000 and until Friday last week you were among those who were reported unpaid .

in verw of this ,you are to reconfirm your information below to enable us to start the process of releasing your fund via ATM card which will be delivered to your home address.

(1)YOUR FULL NAMES(2)YOUR HOME ADDRESS(3)A COPY OF ANY FORM OF IDENTIFICATION(4)YOUR TELEPHONE NUMBER WHATSAPP PREFERABLY.

THANK YOU AS I LOOK FORWARD TO HEARING FROM YOU SOON.
Regards
Grace Sender

subject: Re: Dear Sharon,
body:
Hello Grace,

Thank you for your email. It's quite surprising to hear about this compensation scheme. I must admit, I wasn't aware of such a program being run by the UN IMF and these five countries. 

Could you please provide more details about how my name and email were selected for this? Also, could you explain a bit more about how this ATM card system works? 

I'm sorry but I'm not comfortable sharing personal information like my home address or phone number at this stage. I hope you understand.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Sharon

subject: RE: Dear Sharon,
body:
Well Sharon,like i did mention in my previous mail ,your name and email is right here in our system and i have sent you mail over time without any response from you until yesterday.

The names and email of 106 proven victims were selected by representatives of all the bodies /organizations involved in this compensation scheme and you happen to be one.
Your personal information ,phone number and home address is %100 safe. It is only for recomfilm,and easy communication as your fund will be delivered to your home via an ATM CARD.

You have nothing to me afraid off as this transaction will only take 7 workings to conclude
________________________________
De: bx51769@***.com <bx51769@***.com> en nombre de Sharon <bx51769@***.com>
Enviado: viernes, 9 de febrero de 2024 2:14
Para: bri_comm_ng@windowslive.com <bri_comm_ng@windowslive.com>
Asunto: Re: Dear Sharon,




Hello Grace,

Thank you for your email. It's quite surprising to hear about this compensation scheme. I must admit, I wasn't aware of such a program being run by the UN IMF and these five countries.

Could you please provide more details about how my name and email were selected for this? Also, could you explain a bit more about how this ATM card system works?

I'm sorry but I'm not comfortable sharing personal information like my home address or phone number at this stage. I hope you understand.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Sharon

subject: Re: RE: Dear Sharon,
body:
Hello Sharon,

Thank you for your prompt response. I understand your concerns and appreciate your interest in learning more about this program.

Your name and email were selected through a random computer ballot system, which was conducted by the UN IMF and these five countries. This is a common method used to ensure fairness and transparency in such programs.

As for the ATM card system, it's quite simple. Once everything is set up, an ATM card will be issued in your name. This card will be loaded with the funds allocated to you under this scheme. You can then use this card at any ATM machine worldwide to withdraw your funds.

I respect your decision not to share personal information at this stage. Rest assured, we will only ask for such details when necessary and with your full consent.

Please let me know if you have any other questions or need further clarification on anything.

Best wishes,
Sharon
